channel.title: Moparclassic Error
channel.description:
So I keep getting this error. I just downloaded fresh off the source page. I imported the database.sql into myphp already. This is the problem I'm getting when I "runls" and "run_server"
This is the LoginServer side [img]http://s8.postimg.org/o9p32tbn9/error.jpg[/img]
This is the GameServer side [img]http://s8.postimg.org/t72nnxdmd/Error_2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Moparclassic Error
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:12, topic:527711”]Why not just forget about jenkins and the obviously-not-going-to-happen alpha release?[/quote]I’ve been waiting for a response from MITB.

Anyway, if you want to go ahead and merge it back into master, go for it.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Lothy, post:10, topic:527711”]Ahh. Are there plans to merge back into master? :P[/quote]The plan was to merge back after alpha, but AFAIK Jenkins and the server aren’t up, so we really can’t get out of alpha.

item.title: Moparclassic Error
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:4, topic:527711”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=646464.msg4347611#msg4347611 date=1376120833]
Read the errors.
‘{’ expected
You need an opening bracket.

]‘catch’ without ‘try’
If the try isn’t working, then the catch wouldn’t work either.
[/quote]That’s not the problem, moron. The problem is that it’s using Java 7’s try-with-resources feature, which isn’t supported in Java 6.[/quote]

You should update the readme on the repo to specify minimum requirements.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparclassic Error

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:4, topic:527711”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=646464.msg4347611#msg4347611 date=1376120833]
Read the errors.
‘{’ expected
You need an opening bracket.

]‘catch’ without ‘try’
If the try isn’t working, then the catch wouldn’t work either.
[/quote]
[size=36pt]moron.[/size][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Moparclassic Error
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:3, topic:527711”]Read the errors.
‘{’ expected
You need an opening bracket.

]‘catch’ without ‘try’
If the try isn’t working, then the catch wouldn’t work either.[/quote]That’s not the problem, moron. The problem is that it’s using Java 7’s try-with-resources feature, which isn’t supported in Java 6.

Read the errors.

You need an opening bracket.

If the try isn’t working, then the catch wouldn’t work either.
